title: How to Game Spotify and Dyson’s Insane Headphones
description:
Marques and Andrew discuss how some people could potentially be gaming Spotify through playlists before jumping into the new Samsung M8 Monitor and a new Playstation Subscription. They wrap it up with a new Dyson product that or may not be an April Fool's joke (we hope it is!) This is a fun one! 

P.S - Make sure to join the Discord if you're interested in joining us on the Place Reddit experiment!

Links:
The Electric Car Pre-Order Problem
Bitr8 Analogue Pocket
Reply All - Episode #183
MKBHD Spotify Playlist
Playstation Subscription
Dyson Article
Naomi Wu Twitter thread
Josh Wardle Interview
